SA10n1060:5: tena ca duḥkhena kasyacidbhavitavyaṃ na nirāśrayeṇeti,
SA10n1060:6: ato vidyata eva duḥkhasyāśrayaḥ, sa cātmeti |
SA10n1060:9: taddhi bhavet svayaṃ kṛtaṃ vā parakṛtaṃ vā ubhayakṛtaṃ vā heturahitaṃ vā |
SA10n1060:10: sarvathā ca iṣyamāṇaṃ tatkāryameva nāstīti pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1060:12: duḥkhamityeka icchanti tacca kāryaṃ na yujyate ||1 ||
SA10n1060:13: tatraike vādinaḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti pratipannāḥ |
SA10n1060:17: sarvathā ca tadduḥkhamiṣyamāṇaṃ kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ na yujyate,
SA10n1060:20: svayaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi bhavetpratītya na tato bhavet |
SA10n1060:22: yasmādimān maraṇāntikān skandhān pratītya ime aupapattyāṃśikāḥ skandhā utpadyante tasmātsvayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti nopapadyate ||2 ||
SA10n1060:23: idānīṃ parakṛtamapi duḥkhaṃ yathā na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1060:25: yadyamībhya ime'nye syurebhyo vāmī pare yadi |
SA10n1060:27: yadā amībhyo maraṇāntikebhyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ ime aupapattyāṃśikāḥ skandhā anye syuḥ,
SA10n1060:28: ebhyo vā aupapattyāṃśikebhyaḥ amī maraṇāntikā skandhāḥ pare syuḥ,
SA10n1060:32: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat |
SA10n1060:36: tadā sati anyatve etaiḥ parabhūtaiḥ skandhairamī parabhūtāḥ kṛtā iti yuktaṃ vaktuṃ syāt |
SA10n1060:39: atha syāt - na brūmo yasmādduḥkhenaiva duḥkhaṃ kṛtam,
SA10n1060:43: ityataḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti brūmaḥ | ucyate -
SA10n1060:45: svapudgalaḥ sa katamo yena duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam ||4 ||
SA10n1060:46: yadetanmanuṣyaduḥkhaṃ pañcopādānaskandhalakṣaṇaṃ svayaṃ pudgalena kṛtamiti parikalpyate,
SA10n1060:47: kalpyatā masau pudgalo yena tadduḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam |
SA10n1060:51: athāpi manuṣyaduḥkhopādānena pudgalena tadeva duḥkhaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt,
SA10n1060:57: evaṃ tāvat svapudgalakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na bhavati ||4 ||
SA10n1060:63: tasmāttasya pudgalasya tadduḥkhaṃ parapudgalajameva bhavati | ucyate -
SA10n1060:65: pareṇa kṛtvā tadduḥkhaṃ sa duḥkhena vinā kutaḥ ||5 ||
SA10n1060:67: tena ca manuṣyapudgalena tadduḥkhaṃ kṛtvā parasmai devapudgalāya pradīyata iti sa devapudgalo devaduḥkhavinirmuktaḥ kuto yasmai pradīyeteti |
SA10n1060:68: evaṃ tāvadaparapudgalajasya duḥkhasya pratigrāhaka eva nāsti ||5 ||
SA10n1060:72: vinā duḥkhena yaḥ kṛtvā parasmai prahiṇoti tat ||6 ||
SA10n1060:74: sa manuṣyopādānavyatiriktaḥ katamo yo devapudgalāya devaduḥkhaṃ kṛtvā praheṣyati?
SA10n1060:78: paro hi duḥkhaṃ yatkuryāttattasya syātsvayaṃ kṛtam ||7 ||
SA10n1060:83: tataḥ svayaṃkṛtasyāprasiddheryadā manuṣyapudgalena svayaṃ tadduḥkhaṃ na kṛtam,
SA10n1060:84: tadā kutaḥ parapudgalasya devākhyasya tadduḥkhaṃ parakṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
SA10n1060:87: na tāvatsvakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na hi tenaiva tatkṛtam |
SA10n1060:89: itaśca svaparābhyāṃ duḥkhasya karaṇaṃ na yujyate,
SA10n1060:97: sa eva tāvannātmanā kṛto nātmanā niṣpannaḥ tasyāpi hetvantarāpekṣaṇāt |
SA10n1060:99: sa kathamavidyamānasvabhāvaḥ san paraṃ kariṣyatīti na yuktametat ||8 ||
SA10n1060:102: yadi hi ekaikena duḥkhasya karaṇaṃ syāt syāttadānīmubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkham |
SA10n1060:104: na caikaikena prāṇātipāte kṛte dvābhyāṃ kṛta iti vyapadeśo dṛṣṭaḥ ||
SA10n1060:112: tadidānīṃ kuta eva nirhetukaṃ bhaviṣyati khapuṣpasaugandhyavat?
SA10n1060:115: evaṃ bāhyā api bījāṅkuraghaṭapaṭādayo bhāvā veditavyāḥ,
SA10n1060:117: na kevalaṃ hi duḥkhasya cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate |
SA10n1060:122: tatkatamena tarhi idānīṃ prakāreṇa eṣāṃ siddhiriti |
SA10n1060:125: niyatameṣāṃ caturṇāṃ prakārāṇāmanyatamena prakāreṇa siddhiḥ syāt |
SA10n1060:128: atha viparyāsamātralabdhātmasattākāyā duḥkhādisaṃvṛteḥ pratītyasamutpāda vyavasthā mṛgyate,
